title: [IIP-14] Risk-Adjusted removal and Polygon LP staking funding
body:
### Summary
This off-chain poll aims to gauge the sentiment among stkIDLE holders regarding [IIP-14](https://gov.idle.finance/t/iip-14-risk-adjusted-removal-and-polygon-lp-staking-funding/688), which has been [launched on-chain](https://idle.finance/#/governance/proposals/14).
If the poll will reach the quorum, the vote will be broadcasted on-chain.

This IIP would remove $IDLE LM from Risk-Adjusted DAI, USDC, USDT and transfer 35,000 $IDLE from Ecosystem Fund to Treasury League multisig.

### IIP Motivation
The post [Risk-Adjusted Removal for Tranches Migration](https://gov.idle.finance/t/risk-adjusted-removal-for-tranches-migration/673) introduced several reasons to deprecate Risk-Adjusted strategies and deactivate $IDLE liquidity mining on those pools, with Senior tranche representing the natural security-first product for risk-averse users.
The proposal passed the [Temperature Check](https://gov.idle.finance/t/risk-adjusted-removal-for-tranches-migration/673/5).

In parallel, Governance approved via [Temperature Check](https://gov.idle.finance/t/3-phase-proposal-to-foster-liquidity-provision-lp-staking-analysis/681/3) the allocation of 15,000 $IDLE (amount rounded up to ensure to have at least $100k as overall liquidity) for UNI v3 pool and 20,000 $IDLE to fund Polygon LP staking program. The proposal has been discussed [here](https://gov.idle.finance/t/3-phase-proposal-to-foster-liquidity-provision-lp-staking-analysis/681).

Check the details of the motivations [here](https://gov.idle.finance/t/iip-14-risk-adjusted-removal-and-polygon-lp-staking-funding/688).

### Details
The technical implementation was developed by Dev League.

Treasury League wallet: [0xfb3bd022d5dacf95ee28a6b07825d4ff9c5b3814](https://app.zerion.io/0xfb3bd022d5dacf95ee28a6b07825d4ff9c5b3814/overview)

Actions:
* $IDLE LM removed from Risk-Adjusted DAI, USDC, USDT: 3 actions
* 35k $IDLE transfer from Ecosystem Fund to Treasury League: 1 action

This IIP complies with the [stkIDLE Voting Framework](https://gov.idle.finance/t/voting-framework-for-stkidle-holders/567).
Only stkIDLE holders can vote on this poll.
**Threshold to make the poll valid** (both metrics should be reached):
- 30% of circulating stkIDLE voting the poll (min. 71’083 stkIDLE)
- at least 70% on the same option

If the poll reaches the quorum, the community multisig will broadcast the decision on-chain.
Current On-chain Voting Power: 339’362 $IDLE


### Voting Options
Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
**FOR**: Approve IIP-14 execution
**AGAINST**: Vote against IIP-14 execution
